sections.title: People Matrix
sections.instructions: List all team members, each with key skills and their weekly capacity available for this team.

sections.title: Key Values / Code of Conduct
sections.instructions: Describe the culture of your collaboration, and how you will interact with the rest of the world. List at least three guidelines for behaviors or ethical constraints you consider essential to the success of your team.m

sections.title: Team Development and Goals
sections.instructions: Describe where the team wants to be in 90 days, the strategy to achieve these goals, and, if possible, how to measure success.

sections.title: Required Skills
sections.instructions: Compile a list of all required skills for the team’s work, assess each team member’s skill levels from 0=untrained, to 4=can teach others) and interest in applying or acquiring that skill (0-3).

sections.title: Roles and Responsibilities
sections.instructions: List all roles in your team, and who currently holds them, as well as any other expected contributions for each member of the team.

sections.title: Personal Goals and Growing Edges
sections.instructions: Describe individual member’s personal goals and growing edges related to the team.

sections.title: People’s Needs and Expectations
sections.instructions: List any needs and expectations of individual team members relevant to the team.
Important agreements/norms/rules that are essential for the daily work of the team, e.g. about distribution of work, decision making, work process or conflict resolution.
sections.title: Key Agreements
Events
sections.instructions: A schedule of regular team events (e.g. Daily Standup, Retrospectives, Governance Meetings).
